# Task and Solutions Professional Services 2.2 Business Continuity Consultant & 3.6 Risk Management Specialist Senior
## Service Provisions
Women and Gender Equality Canada (WAGE) invites qualified professionals to provide business continuity planning and risk management services. The successful bidder will assist in updating and developing the department's business continuity plan, business impact assessment, and departmental threat and risk assessment to ensure resilience against disruptions caused by the hybrid work model.

## Tender Details
* **Procurement Number**: P2500079
* **Solicitation Reference**: cb-521-69343368
* **Publication Date**: November 18, 2024
* **Bid Closing Date**: December 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 16, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026
* **Status**: Open

## Description of Services
The contractor will provide senior risk management specialist and business continuity consultant services, including:

* Developing and updating business continuity plans and business impact assessments
* Conducting departmental threat and risk assessments
* Providing consultation and support for the implementation of hybrid work models

## Eligibility and Selection
* Eligible bidders are firms or individuals possessing a proven track record in business continuity planning and risk management.
* Award will be based on the lowest evaluatable price.

## Trade Agreements
The contract will be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
